attributes.action: • Introduce chiropractic services back into the NHS
attributes.additional_details: There’s evidence based research out there that chiropractic improve joint function mood and muscles and I will tell you myself, this is true. I go to the chiropractic and I have better joint function, more stable hips, and my mood is better.
attributes.background: I have fibromyalgia which is a chronic pain condition I have tried Physio The only thing that has come across that works for pain is chiropractic services but sadly that is one of the crucial services that have been cut from NHS funding so I have to pay and I may have to stop my treatment

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because chiropractic treatment is available on the NHS in some areas and circumstances.

The decision on whether to offer chiropractic treatment is the responsibility of Integrated care boards (ICBs). You can find more information about them here: https://www.england.nhs.uk/commissioning/who-commissions-nhs-services/ccg-ics/
